DOC.brief_summary: Overactive bladder syndrome ( OAB ) affect around 17 % female population . However , etiology OAB complicate unclear many aspect . Bladder wall thickness report strongly associate OAB , use screen tool remain controversial . Besides , study report pattern sexual dysfunction female patient low urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) . Therefore aim study analyze bladder wall blood perfusion pattern female LUTS patient , association bladder wall blood perfusion pattern efficacy anti-muscarinic treatment female OAB , pattern sexual dysfunction female LUTS patient .
DOC.brief_title: Bladder Wall Blood Perfusion Pattern Sexual Dysfunction Female Patients With Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms , Association That Perfusion Pattern Therapeutic Efficacy Antimuscarincs Female Overactive Bladder Syndrome .
DOC.criteria: case female patient low urinary tract symptom
